column1: The Purple Pig////Our wait time to be seated was less than a couple minutes
column2: and our server arrived promptly at our table for our drink order. During our meal
column3: we were then greeted by another server
column5: who engaged with our table very well and even offered some great recommendations. She was very friendly
column6: always had a smile on her face
column7: and made the entire experience that much better.
